item.title: Spinning Wonders
item.author: debashishdekanits2015@gmail.com (Debashish Deka)
item.description: (1) Talk about how and where I got the case study (2) Agenda : What we will discuss in this blog ? (3) Core Idea of a program that can expose the track size, etc. (4) Show my experiments with correct method and explain a new paramater extraction process. -> Highlight the fact that the increase in latency indeed matches with the theory. (5) Also add the wrong method approach and why it is wrong and why the graph do not follow
